name: Forest Harvester Tractor 3D
detailed_description:
When trees are felled, the chips will fly — that is definitely about Forest Harvester Tractor 3D game. Here you are to control a huge logging machine and work with felling. Start the pit-sawing mission right now! And when you have chopped enough timber — time for another type of activity: managing your forest base!


Join the massive wood production mission. Explore the forest in search of most suitable tree species. Choose only the best timber.

Control a modern logging machine. Take part in logging activities and use all abilities of one of the newest sawmill equipment.

Use claw to grab tree trunks and bend them with the help of the saw. Do as many wood products as possible. But be extremely accurate, using claw and saw. Don't spoil the timber.

Expand and improve your base: add more garages so you could work not just alone, but with companions, so you would gain even more timber. Build woodworking facilities to produce construction materials and furniture from the raw wood and sell it for the higher profits!

Try Forest Harvester Tractor simulator and you’ll get:

▪ Opportunity to control a mighty logging machine;
▪ Realistic and detailed logging process;
▪ Wide forest area for pit-sawing activities;
▪ Wonderful nature and landscapes to admire;
▪ An industrial base that can be upgraded to maximize your profit.

short_description: Great pit-saw mission starts on one of the most  wooded areas. Control a modern forest harvester and produce as many timber as possible. Also you can build industrial base and process the raw wood into more valuable products!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
